verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H413>Unto<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
O my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H982>trust<s%> in thee: let me <S%H408>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5970>triumph<s%> over me.
Yea, <S%H1571><s%> let <S%H3605>none<s%> <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H6960>wait<s%> on thee be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> which <S%H898>transgress<s%> without <S%H7387>cause.<s%>
Show <S%H3045><s%> me thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H734>paths.<s%>

Lead <S%H1869><s%> me in thy <S%H571>truth,<s%> and <S%H3925>teach<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation;<s%> on thee do I <S%H6960>wait<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and thy <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> have been ever of <S%H4480>old.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth,<s%> nor my <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> according to thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> me for thy goodness' <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H2898><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Good <S%H2896><s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> will he <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
The <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H1869>guide<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> and the <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H3925>teach<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> unto such as <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
For thy name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H7227>great.<s%>
What <S%H4310><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is he <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H3373>feareth<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> him shall he <S%H3384>teach<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he shall <S%H977>choose.<s%>
His <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3885>dwell<s%> at <S%H2896>ease;<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The <S%H5475>secret<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him; and he will <S%H3045>show<s%> them his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8548>ever<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall pluck my feet <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7272><s%> of the <S%H4480>net.<s%> <S%H7568><s%>
Turn <S%H6437><s%> thee <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H3173>desolate<s%> and <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>
The <S%H6869>troubles<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> are <S%H7337>enlarged:<s%> O bring thou me <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H4480>distresses.<s%> <S%H4691><s%>
Look <S%H7200>upon<s%> mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H5999>pain;<s%> and <S%H5375>forgive<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
Consider <S%H7200><s%> mine <S%H341>enemies;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they are <S%H7231>many;<s%> and they <S%H8130>hate<s%> me with <S%H2555>cruel<s%> <S%H8135>hatred.<s%>
O <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me: let me <S%H408>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I put my <S%H2620>trust<s%> in thee.
Let <S%H8537>integrity<s%> and <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me; <S%H3588>for<s%> I wait <S%H6960>on<s%> thee.
Redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
